irmovl stack,%esp

main :  mrmovl size, %eax       #Taille du tableau
        pushl %eax

        irmovl t, %eax          #Source
        pushl %eax
        
        irmovl r, %eax          #Destination
        pushl %eax
        
        call strcpy
        
        iaddl 12, %esp
        halt


strcpy: mrmovl 4(%esp),%edi
        mrmovl 8(%esp),%esi
        mrmovl 12(%esp),%ecx
        
boucle: lodsl %eax
        stosl %eax
        isubl 1, %ecx
        jne boucle
        ret
        
        .pos 0x100
size:   .long 5

t:      .long 2                     #Source
        .long 3
        .long 5
        .long 7
        .long 11
    
r:                              #Destination
